thread.title: Tam Gibbons
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Tam Gibbons

author: Tam Gibbons
title: Tam Gibbons
text:
I didn't know where to start when comparing solar panel companies. From the information provided I learnt a great deal about what to ask, what to look for and how not to be 'taken for a ride'!
The three Quote: s I got varied quite a lot for the same products, so it is definitely worth getting the three Quote: s.
I would highly recommend friends to go through Solar Quote: s before they contact any installers.
